lead_paragraph: Students of modern Africa exploring the dramas of the postcolonial era might start their quest for pointers in the period surrounding the death of Dag Hammarskjold.

headline.main: For Africa, a Pivotal Plane Crash
headline.print_headline: For Africa, a Pivotal Plane Crash
